Package com.virtualhosts

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.virtualhosts.Config
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for managing configuration of the program Manages: all paths, OS Version
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dusan Malusev
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) static java.lang.String HOSTS
      Path to System hosts file Default to Linux OS /etc/hosts
      static java.lang.String SITES
      Path to the folder where all websites will be stored Default path is set to the Linux OS path /var/www/
      static java.lang.String SITESAVAILABLE
      On Linux systems apache virtual hosts go into separate .conf files into sites-available in apache2 folder Specific to Linux OS /etc/apache2/sites-available/
